props.ariaLabel: ARIA label for the search input to improve accessibility for screen readers.
props.ariaDescribedby: ARIA describedby attribute that references instruction elements for enhanced accessibility.
props.showBackButton: Whether to show a back navigation button instead of the search icon. Used for nested navigation in command palettes.

slots.default: Complete override of the search input component. Scoped slot receives: `modelValue` (reactive search string ref) for full customization.

events.click:back: Emitted when the back navigation button is clicked (when showBackButton is true). No payload.
